pages.title: End mechanic soul
pages.text: After consuming 10 enderman, weak mechanic soul was transformed to end mechanic soul!$(p)In addition to be more powerful weak mechanic soul variant, seems, this soul also provide some limited teleportation abilities for turtle itself.

In additions to weak mechanic soul abilities, this soul also allow limited world-bound teleportation. Seems, you need to store points and then teleport to them!$(p)But be aware, any stored points will be lost after turtle is broken.
